 Promotion for Enterprise Customer on MobiFone 20 th anniversary of Foundation A. Program 1 1. Eligibility and Condition: New Postpaid: Be named by Enterprise or Organization Be named by Personal Customer who is staff of Enterprise or Organization (must be confirmed by company) Customer have to agree to pay: Activation Fee + Sim Fee + Joining Fee And commit to use in 12 periods. 2. Content: - Notes: Customer will register to join this promotion before activating new postpaid at the time receive the device. a. Benefits: Regulation Plan: DN200 Activation Fee VND 35.000 + VND 25.000 = VND 60.000 Joining Fee VND 200.000/period (including monthly subscription fee) Free on-net call plan Free first 10 minutes, maximum 2000 minutes / period Application scope On-net call MF Fixed VNPT number (included Gphone) of Province/City where subscriber register activation Data 2 Gb/ period Promotion time Within 12 periods since the time activate b. Discount when buying Samsung Galaxy S4: Discount 20% product price (on the public price at the time Samsung sell the product in VN One subscriber can buy 1 product c. Regulations: Do not allow to be blocked 2 ways communications, transfer owner ship, switch to prepaid or terminate the contract within promotion time). Free voice call and data allowance is used for each period. Using over allowance: will be charged as current charge rate. 3. Execution Process: Period 1 (12/4 - 12/5/2013): Approach customer and invite them to join this promotion: All centers invite customers to join this promotion by sending "	" Registration Form "	" Period 2 (18/4 - 15/5/2013): Make and confirm list of customer joining this program : All centers collect "	"Registration Form"	" by 3 days after "	"Registration Forms"	" are sent at the latest. After that, send to Enterprise Customer Department Period 3 (From 1/5/2013 as expected): Activate and deliver products to customers. B. Program 2: 1. Eligibility and Condition: Enterprises or Organizations have more than 20 Post paid subscribers (including MG, Fast connect). Enterprises or Organizations have less than 20 Post paid: Within the promotion time, activate enough 20 Post paid subscribers that are named by Enterprise or Organization Not join the 1 st program. Commit to use in 6 periods 2. Content: Discount 20% product price (on the public price at the time Samsung sell the product in VN). Quantity: 1 product/ enterprise - Notes: benefits are applied for Representative Subscriber of Enterprise: In case of there are many/non of Representative Subscribers: CEO can join this promotion or cede to others (Must be MF subscriber and be named by Enterprise) 3. Execution Process: 12/4-12/5/ 2013: Approach customer and invite them to join this promotion (contact directly, open letter, brochure...) 12/4-12/5/2013 or until sell out: customer orders products 6/5-31/5/2013: make out invoice and deliver products 4. Promotion time: From 12/04/2013 to 15/05/2013 &#27427;&#36898; MobiFone &#20844;&#21496;&#25104;&#31435; 20 &#21608;&#24180;&#20043;&#38469;&#30340;&#20225;&#19994;&#23458;&#25143;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; A. &#27963;&#21160;&#19968; 1. &#20248;&#24800;&#23545;&#35937;&#21450;&#26465;&#20214;&#65306; &#26032;&#20837;&#32593;&#21518;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143; &#20225;&#19994;&#25110;&#21333;&#20301;&#21517;&#20041; . 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#51652;&#54665;&#46020; : &#51228; 1 &#52264; : (2013 &#45380; 4 &#50900; 12 &#51068; - 2013 &#45380; 05 &#50900; 12 &#51068; ): &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#50640;&#44172; 2 &#52264; : (2013 &#45380; 4 &#50900; 18 &#51068; - 2013 &#45380; 5 &#50900; 15 &#51068; ): &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#49332; &#44163;&#51012; &#49888;&#52397;&#54620; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51032; &#47749;&#45800;&#51012; &#54869;&#51064;&#54620;&#45796; . &#51228; 3 &#52264; : (2013 &#45380; 5 &#50900; 1 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; &#50696;&#51221; ): &#53685;&#49888;&#47581;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54644;&#49436; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#44760; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#47585;&#44596;&#45796; . ( &#48288;&#53944;&#45224; &#49884;&#51109;&#50640;&#49436; &#51221;&#49885;&#51201;&#51004;&#47196; &#45208;&#53440;&#45216; &#49452;&#49457; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256; &#44068;&#47085;&#49884; S4 &#51032; &#44032;&#44201; &#48708;&#44368; ) &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#45817; &#54620; &#45824;&#47564; &#49332; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#50976;&#51032;: &#44592;&#50629;/&#51312;&#51649;&#51012; &#45824;&#54364;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; &#51201;&#50857;&#46112; &#54812;&#53469; &#45824;&#54364;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#50668;&#47084; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#51080;&#44144;&#45208; &#45824;&#54364;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#44032; &#50630;&#45716; &#44221;&#50864;: &#44592;&#50629;&#51032; &#51228;&#51068; &#45458;&#51008; &#51648;&#46020;&#51088; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#44144;&#45208; &#44592;&#53440; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#51648;&#51221;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#51652;&#54665;&#46020; : 2013 &#45380; 4 &#50900; 12 &#51068; - 2013 &#45380; 05 &#50900; 12 &#51068; : &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#50640;&#44172; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#45824;&#54620; &#50508;&#47140;&#46300;&#47536;&#45796;. 2013 &#45380; 4 &#50900; 18 &#51068; - 2013 &#45380; 5 &#50900; 15 &#51068; : &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#49332; &#44163;&#51012; &#49888;&#52397;&#54620;&#45796;. 2013 &#45380; 5 &#50900; 1 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; &#50696;&#51221; : &#49464;&#44552;&#44228;&#49328;&#49436;&#47484; &#48156;&#44553;&#54644;&#49436; &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#44760; &#55092;&#45824;&#54256;&#51012; &#47585;&#44596;&#45796; . C.&#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036;: 2013&#45380;04&#50900;12&#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013&#45380;05&#50900;15&#51068; &#44620;&#51648; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6065;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047; 20 &#6022;&#6098;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6016;&#6078;&#6031; MF &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047; A. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6017;&#6017; &#6030;&#6098;&#6028; &#6102; &#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6021;&#6075;&#6087;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6032;&#6098;&#6040;&#6072; &#6102;​ &#6024;&#6042;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6060;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6018;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;​ &#6024;&#6042;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6063;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6036;&#6075;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6043;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6070;&#6039;&#6071;&#6036;&#6070;&#6043;-&#6036;&#6075;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;&#6043;&#6071;&#6016;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6060;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6018;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;(&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6018;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;)​ &#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6041;&#6043;&#6091;&#6038;&#6098;&#6042;&#6040;&#6033;&#6076;&#6033;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;​ &#6102; a. &#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091;&#6102;​ &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;​ &#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091;: DN200​ &#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;​ 35.000đ + 25.000đ = 60.000đ &#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091;(&#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;)​ 200.000đ/ &#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;(&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;&#6047;&#6081;&#6044;&#6070;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;)​ &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6048;&#6085;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6033;&#6081;&#6047;​ &#6053;&#6031;&#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6031;&#6086;&#6043;&#6083;10&#6035;&#6070;&#6033;&#6072;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020;,&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031; 2.000 phút / &#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018;​ &#6040;&#6023;&#6098;&#6024;&#6026;&#6098;&#6027;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;​ &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;MF​ &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6043;&#6078;&#6031;&#6075;VNPT (&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;Gphone)&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091; &#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;/&#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6018;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;​ &#6102; &#6016;&#6042;&#6030;&#6072;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6031;&#6086;&#6030;&#6070;&#6020;/&#6018;&#6098;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6031;&#6086;&#6030;&#6070;&#6020;&#6102;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6026;&#6073;&#6016;&#6035;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6098;&#6038;&#6047;&#6091;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038; (&#6043;&#6081;&#6017; MF &#6024;&#6042;&#6024;&#6098;&#6040;&#6084;&#6087;&#6047;&#6048;&#6018;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6047;)&#6100; 3. &#6021;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6037;&#6098;&#6031;&#6078;&#6040;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6102;​​ &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;12/4-12/5/ 2013: &#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6047;&#6050;&#6084;&#6041;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6050;&#6086;&#6038;&#6072;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;(&#6033;&#6086;&#6035;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6086;&#6035;&#6020;&#6037;&#6098;&#6033;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;,&#6043;&#6071;&#6017;&#6071;&#6031;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6038;&#6098;&#6044;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6041;) &#6038;&#6072;12/4-12/5/2013&#6060;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6102;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6025;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033; &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 6/5-31/5/2013:&#6021;&#6081;&#6025;&#6044;&#6071;&#6016;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6096;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;,&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6018;&#6043;&#6091;&#6033;&#6076;&#6042;&#6047;&#6096;&#6038;&#6098;&#6033;&#6050;&#6084;&#6041;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035; C. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 12/04/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 15/05/2013​
